LanguageData.Human.label: human
LanguageData.Human.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
LanguageData.Norbal.label: norbal
LanguageData.Norbal.description: 노르망족 are baseline, tribal humans that have been hardened by colder climates. They are hairy and strong, but are unable to deal with high temperatures. They lack in technology but craft up for it by mastering the basic weapons that they can forge.
